summary.para: Specifies what headers the should add to the message.
The headers of the message are empty.
The headers are initialized to be the same as the source message's headers.
If using or WS_ADDRESSING_VERSION_1_0, then a unique message ID is set as the MessageID header of the message. No other headers are added in the message.

The ReplyTo header of the source message (an ) is used to address the message. The MessageID header of the source message is used to add a RelatesTo header to the message. If the message will contain a fault reply, then should be used instead.

The FaultTo or ReplyTo header of the source message (an ) is used to address the message. The MessageID header of the source message is used to add a RelatesTo header to the message. This should only be used when the contents of the message will contain a fault.
